name: Suicide Adventures
description: Lost in the abyssal depths of limbo, you are a tortured soul who is trapped between life and death, stuck in a dungeon whose puzzles will test you as you strive to go into the afterlife.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or later Processor: Intel Pentium 4 (2001) and above or AMD Processors after 2003 Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Any graphics card that supports Direct X 9 or above. DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 350 MB available space Sound Card: Direct X 9 sound device
